bibl.title: Rethinking New Testament Textual Criticism
bibl.note: Originally presented at a "Symposium on New Testament Studies at Southeastern Seminary" on April 6-7, 2000.
EPP Eldon Jay, Issues in New Testament Textual Criticism: Moving from the Nineteenth Century to the Twenty-First Century.
David Alan BLACK (Ed.), Rethinking New Testament Textual Criticism (Grand Rapids, Mich., 2002) pp. 17-76.
